comment: Honestly she was fine but it is online so you self learn. She does not emphasize how hard ACS is at all and then refuses to curve the exam. Probably would be better to take someone else.
Professor wasn't bad emails came back kind of slow so be ready to wait a day or so to get a response. There is a TON of reading and homework, honestly just do not take chemistry online.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Test heavy

comment: She is amazing and offers lots of ways to get ahead. Lots of homework and a practice test each week, which is to be expect of a harder class, but the practice tests let you have 3 attempts at them which can help boast grades.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: The teacher wasn't really that bad I just made the wrong choice in taking the class online when I should have taken it in person I took this teacher for Chemistry 1211
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Test heavy
